snippet.title: Hump Day Deals: Cheap Car Tyres, $140 Off Ray-Bans, Board Game Clearance
snippet.content:
Hump day (AKA Wednesday) is arguably the most boring day of the week. So why not liven things up by grabbing one of these nifty online bargains? Deals that caught our eye this week include: get 15% off car tyres on eBay, cheap board games, PlayStation Store winter sale.
Games/software
Catch (formerly 'Catch Of The Day') is throwing a huge sale on board games and puzzles, including best-sellers from Hasbro and Mattel. to see what's on offer.
eBay has knocked 20% off select toys and video games, including Lego, consoles and board games. See what's on offer .
The PlayStation Store is having a winter sale with .
eBay is having a sale on Rick And Morty merch. .
Origin is giving away Medal of Honor: Pacific Assault and Battlefield 4: Dragon's Teeth for free. to get the downloads.
This week's Humble Bundle focuses on . Normally, the total cost for these products is as much as $1687. On Humble Bundle, you choose your own price, starting at $1. As always, you can divvy up what you spend between the developers, Humble Bundle and the nominated charity.
Udemy is offering another 22 online courses for free. Topics include Develop Confidence & Self Esteem, R Language Programming and Complete Web Development. to see the full list.
You can currently get a four-month subscription to Google Play Music and YouTube Red . (New customers only.)
Computers/Gadgets
Food/Drink
Catch is having a big sale on pantry goods. to see what's on offer.
Want a bunch of cheap chocolate? .
Time for a groceries run? Here are the latest from Coles.
Miscellaneous
You can currently get up to 15% off tyres from select eBay sellers when you use the discount code "PITSTOP". Details .
Here are for under $20.
Catch has knocked up to $140 off selected Ray-Bans glasses. to see the available styles.
eBay is knocking when you use the discount code "THANKYOU20". The deal ends 10 August.
Big W is having a sale on the.
JB Hi-Fi is having a .
]
eBay is having sale on Pet Care products. to see what's on offer.
Myer is having a 14-day beauty sale with up to 50 per cent off. .
The Humble Bundle is having a sale on Doctor Who books. .
Each Wednesday, Aldi runs a 'Special Buys' sale on a range of heavily discounted items. Today's deals focus on bedding, Asian decorations and gluten-free foods. to see the full range of deals.
